assessmentQuestionVersion.name: Mucopolysaccharidosis_Type_IVA_Initial_Confirmed_Diagnosis_Q1
assessmentQuestionVersion.questionText: Attach evidence of confirmed diagnostic testing of N-acetylgalacosamine-6 sulfate sulfatase (GALNS) activity in peripheral blood leukocytes or fibroblasts (excluding multiple sulfatase deficiency) through enzymatic assay AND Morquio A gene mutation analysis
